title: India Q1 GDP Highlights: Real GDP growth slows to 6.7% in April-June quarter
description:
11:48 (IST) Aug 30

Moody's has observed indications of a resurgence in rural demand, attributed to the promising outlook for agricultural production due to above-average rainfall during the monsoon period. The balance sheets of non-financial corporations and banks have shown significant improvement...

title: RBI Monetary Policy, August 8, 2024: Full text of RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das' speech
description:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) on Thursday, August 8, 2024, kept the repo policy rate unchanged for the ninth time in a row at 6.5 per cent. Here is the full text of RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das's speech:

This was the 50th meeting of the Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) since its inception in Septe...
